bookSourceComment:
本书源修改自关耳010225
在【源变量】里输入token即可登陆
现在能看的VIP章节url的versionCode最大是381
header: {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 12; 2201123C Build/V417IR; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/95.0.4638.74 Safari/537.36/JINJIANG-Android/406(2201123C;Scale/1.75;isHarmonyOS/false)"}

ruleBookInfo.author: $.authorName
ruleBookInfo.intro:
novelId = java.getString("$.novelId"); novelTags = String(java.getString("$.novelTags")).replace(/^(?=\S)|,(?=\S)/g,"🏷️"); mainview = "视角：" + java.getString("$.mainview"); protagonist = String(java.getString("$.protagonist")); costar = String(java.getString("$.costar")); other = String(java.getString("$.other")); novelIntroShort = "一句话简介：" + java.getString("$.novelIntroShort"); littleintro = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro")); littleintro = littleintro.replace(/立意\:/,"立意："); littleintro = /立意：/.test(littleintro) ? littleintro.replace(/.*(立意：.*)/,"$1") : ""; comment_count = "评论：" + String(java.getString("$.comment_count")).replace(/\D/,""); novelbefavoritedcount = "收藏：" + java.getString("$.novelbefavoritedcount"); nutrition_novel = "灌溉：" + java.getString("$.nutrition_novel"); novelIntro = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro")).replace(/立意\:.*$/,""); // 置顶、作者公告 commentListurl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?versionCode=406&novelId=" + novelId + "&limit=5"; A = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentListurl)); top = ""; bulletin = ""; if (A.code == "200" && A.data.commentTotal != "0") { is_top = A.data.commentList[0].is_top; commentAuthor = A.data.commentList[0].commentAuthor; commentBody = A.data.commentList[0].commentBody; ip_pos = A.data.commentList[0].ip_pos; commentDate = A.data.commentList[0].commentDate; if (is_top == "1") { top = commentAuthor + "　" + commentDate + "　来自" + ip_pos + "　[置顶]🔝\n" + commentBody + "
‎"; } if (A.data.commentList[0].bulletinComment == "1") { bulletin = "作者公告　" + commentDate + "　来自" + ip_pos + "\n" + commentBody + "
‎"; } } OtherInfoUrl = "http://app.jjwxc.org/androidapi/getnovelOtherInfo?novelId="+novelId+"&type=novelbasicinfo&versionCode=406"; B = JSON.parse(java.ajax(OtherInfoUrl)); // 完结评分 novelreview = B.novelreview; novelreview = novelreview.match(/\d分/)?"评分："+novelreview:""; contentinfo = novelTags+"\n"+novelIntroShort+"\n"+mainview+"\n"+protagonist+"\n"+costar+"\n"+other+"\n"+littleintro+"\n"+comment_count+"\n"+novelbefavoritedcount+"\n"+nutrition_novel+"\n"+novelreview; // 抽奖 novelidPrizeTitle = B.novelidPrize.data.novelidPrizeTitle; novelidPrizeCondition = B.novelidPrize.data.novelidPrizeCondition headcount = B.novelidPrize.data.headcount; prize = B.novelidPrize.data.prize; reasonfordraw = B.novelidPrize.data.reasonfordraw; novelidPrize = novelidPrizeTitle+"\n"+reasonfordraw+"\n"+novelidPrizeCondition+"　"+headcount+"　"+prize; novelidPrize = /[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/.test(novelidPrizeTitle)?novelidPrize+"
‎":""; // 请假条 leaveDateBack = B.novelLeave.leaveDateBack; leaveContent = B.novelLeave.leaveContent; leaveDate = B.novelLeave.leaveDate; novelLeave = leaveDateBack+"\n"+leaveContent+"\n"+leaveDate; novelLeave = /[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/.test(leaveDateBack)?novelLeave+"
‎":""; INTRO = String(top).length > 160 ? `\t${novelLeave}\n${novelidPrize}\n${bulletin}\n${contentinfo}\n‎\n${novelIntro}
‎\n${top}` : `\t${novelLeave}\n${novelidPrize}\n${bulletin}\n${top}\n${contentinfo}\n‎\n${novelIntro}`; ##主角：\n|配角：\n|其它：\n|立意：\n
ruleBookInfo.kind:
<js>
novelStep = java.getString("$.novelStep");
novelStatus = novelStep == "0" ? "暂停" : novelStep == "1" ? "连载" : "完结";
result = `${java.getString("$.novelClass")},${novelStatus},${java.getString("$.chapterdateNewest")}`;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.novelName

ruleContent.content:
<js>
function decode() {
	let date = "Mobile " + Date.now();
	let response = java.get(baseUrl, {"User-Agent": String(date)});
	let accesskey = String(response.header("accesskey"));
	let keyString = String(response.header("keystring"));
	let content = String(response.body());
	let accesskeyLen = accesskey.length;

	let v9 = Array.from(accesskey).reduce((sum, char) => sum + String(char).charCodeAt(), 0);
	let v15 = v9 % keyString.length;
	let v17 = Math.floor(v9 / 65);
	let v43 = keyString.substring(v15, (v17 + v15 > keyString.length) ? (keyString.length - v15 + v15) : (v17 + v15));

	let v6 = String(accesskey[accesskeyLen - 1]).charCodeAt();
	let v32 = content.length;
	let [v38, dest] = (v6 & 1) != 0 
		? [content.substring(v32 - 12), content.substring(0, v32 - 12)] 
		: [content.substring(0, 12), content.substring(12)];

	let key = java.md5Encode(v43 + v38).substring(0, 8);
	let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).substring(0, 8);
	return java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String(key), String(iv)).decryptStr(dest);
}

key = source.getVariable();
extend = book.getVariable("custom");
novelid = java.get("novelId");
chapterid = java.get("chapterId");
isvip = java.get("isVip");

if (isvip == "0") {
  content = java.getString("$.content");
  upDown = java.getString("$.upDown");
  saybody = java.getString("$.sayBody");
  message = java.getString("$.message");
} else {
  if (/content/.test(result)) {
    java.setContent(result);
  } else {
    java.setContent(decode());
  }

  content = java.getString("$..content");
  if (String(content).length > 30) {
    content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", "KW8Dvm2N", "1ae2c94b").decryptStr(content);
  } else {
    content = "";
  }

  upDown = java.getString("$..upDown");
  saybody = java.getString("$..sayBody");
  message = java.getString("$..message");
  buy_ratio = java.getString("$..buy_ratio");
  reader_buy_ratio = java.getString("$..reader_buy_ratio");
};

chapterintro = java.get("chapterintro");
pointMeassge = java.get("pointmeassge");

content1 = `\t${chapterintro}\n${message}`;
if (pointMeassge != "0晋江币") {
    content1 += "\n价格：" + pointMeassge + "（APP专享价）";
}
if (/免费赠送的福利番外/.test(message)) {
    content1 += "\n本福利番外赠送给正文订阅率达到" + buy_ratio + "的读者\n您截止至上一章的正文订阅率：" + reader_buy_ratio;
}
saybody = saybody != "" && !/关闭作话/.test(extend) ? `\t▍作者有话说：${saybody}` : "";
Content = content == "" ? content1 : (upDown == "0" ? `${saybody}\n‎\n${content}` : `${content}\n${saybody}`);

commentnum = String(extend).replace(/\D+/g, "");
limit = commentnum == "" ? "5" : commentnum;

if (isvip == "0") {
	commentUrl = `https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?versionCode=406&novelId=${novelid}&limit=${limit}&offset=0&commentSort=0&chapterId=${chapterid}`;
	} else {
	commentUrl = `https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?versionCode=406&novelId=${novelid}&limit=${limit}&offset=0&commentSort=0&token=${key}&chapterId=${chapterid}`;
	}

Comment = /评论/.test(extend) ? JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)) : "";
Commentcontent = "";

if (Comment.code == "200") {
  commentList = Comment.data.commentList || [];
  
  if (commentList.length > 0) {
    Commentcontent = commentList.map(C => {
      let { commentBody, commentDate, commentAuthor, ip_pos, agreenum, commentMark, subscriptionrate } = C;
      return `•——————•——————•\n👤${commentAuthor}　${commentDate}　来自${ip_pos}　${commentMark}分\n${commentBody}\n👍[${agreenum}]　💰${subscriptionrate}\n`;
    }).join("");
  }
}

Commentcontent = Commentcontent != "" ? `\n‎\n▍评论：\n${Commentcontent}` : "";

Content + Commentcontent;
</js>

ruleExplore.author: $.authorName
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/signin/)) {
	result = "{signIn:[" + src + "]}";
	} else {
	result = result;
	}
</js>
$.addData||$.data[0].data||$.data.data||$.data.novellist||$.data.list||$.signIn[*]
ruleExplore.intro:
<js>
intro2 = java.getString("$.novelIntroShort||$.novelintroshort");
tags = String(java.getString("$.tags")).replace(/^(?=\S)|[,]/g,"🏷️");
remarks = java.getString("$.remarks");
remarks = remarks == "" ? "" : "　📝备注：" + remarks;
intro = intro2 + remarks + "\n‎\n" + tags;
</js>
ruleExplore.kind:
<js>
novelClass = String(java.getString("$.novelClass"));
novelStep = java.getString("$.novelStep");
novelStatus = novelStep == "0" ? ",暂停" : (novelStep == "1" ? ",连载" : ",完结");
novelStatus = novelStep == "" ? "" : novelStatus;
chapterDateNewest = java.getString("$.chapterdateNewest");
kind = `${novelClass}${novelStatus}${chapterDateNewest ? `,${chapterDateNewest}` : ""}`;
</js>
ruleExplore.name: $.novelName||$.message

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
name = java.getString("$.chaptername");
chaptertype = java.getString("$.chaptertype");
pointMeassge = java.getString("$.pointMeassge");
chapterMessage = java.getString("$.chapterMessage") == "福利番外" ? "🧧[福利番外]" : ""; 
java.put("pointmeassge",pointMeassge);
chapterid = java.getString("$.chapterid");
islock = java.getString("$.islock") == "0" ? "" : "🔒[锁]";
isvip = java.getString("$.isvip") == "0" ? "" : "💸";
if (chaptertype == "0") {
	chaptername = String(name).replace(/[【]?第\s?\d+\s?章[】]?\s*|[第]?[〇零一二三四五六七八九十百千万两□]+章\s*|(?=^)\d+(?=$)|福利番外/g,"");
	chaptername = `${isvip}第${chapterid}章 ${chaptername}${chaptername == "" ? chapterMessage : " " + chapterMessage}${chaptername == "" ? islock : " " + islock}`;
	} else {
	volumename = `📜${name}`;
	}
</js>
ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
key = source.getVariable();
novelid = java.getString("$.novelid");
java.put("novelId",novelid);
chapterid = java.getString("$.chapterid");
java.put("chapterId",chapterid);
isvip = java.getString("$.isvip");
java.put("isVip",isvip);
chaptertype = java.getString("$.chaptertype");
if(isvip == "0"){
	url = "https://app-cdn.jjwxc.com/androidapi/chapterContent?novelId=" + novelid + "&chapterId=" + chapterid;
	} else {
	url = "https://app-cdn.jjwxc.com/androidapi/chapterContent?novelId=" + novelid + "&versionCode=381&token=" + key + "&chapterId=" + chapterid;
	};
chapterUrl = chaptertype == "0" ? url : "";
</js>

variableComment:
在设置【书籍变量】中
输入“关闭作话”：可以不显示正文中的作者有话说（默认开启作者有话说）；
输入“评论”：可以开启评论显示（默认关闭评论）
输入“评论20”：可以开启显示20条评论（不加上数字默认显示5条）

bookSourceComment: 在【源变量】输入token即可登陆； 在【书籍变量】里输入1，开启书籍评论（默认关闭） 目录 更新时间（不用的代码）：[-](?=[一-龥]) 正文：A = ''+" "+novelTags+" "+mainview+" "+protagonist+" "+costar+" "+other+" "+novelIntroShort+" "+novelIntro1+" "+commentcount+" "+novelbefavoritedcount+" ‎ "+novelIntro+" ‎ "+"【"+novelId+"】"+" "+"【"+codeUrl+"】"

ruleBookInfo.author: span[itemprop='name']@text
ruleBookInfo.name: td[height='40']@span.volumnfont@b@text

ruleContent.content:
<js>
islock = java.getString("$.islock");
if(islock == "0") {
	// 简介
	novelCover = java.getString("$.novelCover");
	novelStep = java.getString("$.novelStep");
	novelStatus = novelStep == "0" ? "暂停" : (novelStep == "1" ? "连载" : "完结");
	novelClass = java.getString("$.novelClass");
	novelTags = String(java.getString("$.novelTags")).replace(/^(?=\S)|,(?=\S)/g,"🏷️");
	mainview = "视角："+java.getString("$.mainview");
	protagonist = String(java.getString("$.protagonist"));
	costar = String(java.getString("$.costar"));
	other= String(java.getString("$.other"));
	novelIntroShort = "一句话简介："+java.getString("$.novelIntroShort");
	littleintro = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro"));
	littleintro = littleintro.replace(/立意\:/,"立意：");
	littleintro = /立意：/.test(littleintro) ? littleintro.replace(/.*(立意：.*)/,"$1") : "";
	comment_count = "评论："+String(java.getString("$.comment_count")).replace(/\D/,"");
	novelbefavoritedcount = "收藏："+java.getString("$.novelbefavoritedcount");
	nutrition_novel = "灌溉："+java.getString("$.nutrition_novel");
	novelIntro = String(java.getString("$.novelIntro")).replace(/立意\:.*$/,"");
	novelId = String(java.getString("$.novelId")).replace(/^(?=\S)/,"https://app-cdn.jjwxc.com/androidapi/novelbasicinfo?novelId=");
	codeUrl = java.getString("$.codeUrl");
	A =  novelClass+"　"+novelStatus+"\n"+novelTags+"\n"+mainview+"\n"+protagonist+"\n"+costar+"\n"+other+"\n"+novelIntroShort+"\n"+littleintro+"\n"+comment_count+"\n"+novelbefavoritedcount+"\n"+nutrition_novel+"\n‎\n"+novelIntro+"\n‎\n"+"【"+novelId+"】"+"\n"+"【"+codeUrl+"】";

	// 评论
	extend = book.getVariable("custom");
	commenturl = "https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+String(novelId).replace(/\D+/g,"");
	commentall = /1/.test(extend) ? JSON.parse(java.ajax(commenturl)) : "";
	cstate = commentall.state;
	
	if (cstate == "200") {
		cbody = commentall.body;
		commentL = cbody.map(P => {
			let { foldlingauthor, commentbody, chapterid: pchapterid, commentmark, vip_chapter_icon, subscriptionicon, agreenum, ip_pos, commentdate } = P;
			return `•——————•——————•\n👤${foldlingauthor}　${subscriptionicon}　打分：${commentmark}　所评章节：${pchapterid}${vip_chapter_icon}\n${commentbody}\n👍[${agreenum}]　来自${ip_pos}　发表时间：${commentdate}\n`;
			}).join("");
   } else {
   commentL = "";
   }
  A = commentL != "" ? `${A}\n‎\n${commentL}` : A;
	} else {
	message = java.getString("$.message");
	}
</js>

ruleExplore.intro:
<js>
renew = java.getString("$.renew.novelName");
renewdate = java.getString("$.renew.renewdate");
favorite = java.getString("$.favorite.novelName");
favoriteEnd = java.getString("$.favoriteEnd.novelName");

`最新更新：《${renew}》　${renewdate}\n最热小说：《${favorite}》\n完结佳作：《${favoriteEnd}》`;
</js>
ruleExplore.kind:
<js>
authorSign = java.getString("$.authorSign");
signStatus = authorSign == 0 ? "未签约作者" : "签约作者";

favoriteNum = java.getString("$.favoriteNum");
multiplescore = java.getString("$.multiplescore");

let a1 = `被收藏数：${favoriteNum}`;
let a2 = multiplescore != "" ? `, 总积分：${multiplescore}` : "";

`${a1}${a2}, ${signStatus}`;
</js>
